title: The Day the Music Died
description: After a prominent plastic surgeon is murdered in his Asheville, North Carolina home, investigators uncover a trail of clues pointing to an unlikely killer. Keith Morrison reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
